entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
